name: MusicMasterforSpotify
0:
”Alexa, open music master”
”Alexa, open music master and add song to playlist”
”Alexa, tell music master to set volume to five percent”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: music master
des:
Feedback and problems to:
topa.developer@gmail.com

Requirements:
 - Connected Spotify account to skill.
 - Playing music on alexa device is only possible with Spotify premium

Features:
 - Add Song to your library 
 - Add songs to playlist
 - Play similar songs to the currently playing one
 - Play more song by the current artist
 - Control volume in percent
 - Transfer playback to other devices
 - Turn shuffle on/off
 - Play playlists
 - Play songs
 - Pause/Resume playback
 
Examples:
"Alexa, open music master and add song to my library"

"Alexa, open music master and add song to playlist" (Selection of playlist follows)

"Alexa, open music master and play similar songs"

"Alexa, open music master and play more songs by this artist"

"Alexa, open music master and turn down volume by five percent"
"Alexa, open music master and set volume to seven percent"

"Alexa, open music master and play music on my smartphone"
"Alexa, open music master and transfer playback to playstation"
"Alexa, open music master and transfer playback to device one"

"Alexa, open music master and turn shuffle on"

"Alexa, open music master and start the playlist <playlist name>"
"Alexa, open music master and play my saved songs"

"Alexa, open music master and play <song name>"
"Alexa, open music master and play <song name> by <musician name>"

"Alexa, tell music master to pause"
"Alexa, tell music master to resume"

This product is unofficial and not licensed by Spotify.
